overview: "If any man shall add to these things, God shall add unto him the plagues written in this book. And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from these things that are written in this book." Apocalypse 22:18-19 / "We are blind before the Apocalypse." GÃ¼nther Anders
title: APOCALIPSIS 20 21 22
